  • Classes and Interfaces

Package game

package game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bullet
    Represents a bullet fired by a player or an enemy.
    Collectible
    Represents a collectible item that increases the player's score when collected.
    Controls
    Handles player input using the keyboard.
    EndScreen
    The EndScreen class displays the end-of-game screen, showing the final score and providing options to return to the main menu or exit the game.
    Game
    The Game class manages the overall game flow, including starting the game, switching levels, and resetting or ending the game.
    GameLevel
    An abstract class representing a general game level.
    GameView
    The GameView class displays the game's graphical view, including the background, player, health bar, and score.
    Gun
    The Gun class represents a collectible gun item in the game.
    Health
    The Health class manages the player's health points and handles health bar drawing and player death.
    Level1
    Level1 sets up the first level of the game.
    Level2
    Level2 sets up the second level of the game.
    Level3
    Level3 sets up the third and final level of the game.
    MainMenu
    MainMenu sets up the initial menu screen with buttons to start the game, view instructions, view controls, or close the game.
    Player
    Player represents the character controlled by the player in the game.
    PolygonEditor
    Very basic polygon editor.
    Portal
    Portal allows the player to move to the next level when they make contact with it.
    Score
    Score manages the player's points during the game.
    Skeleton
    Skeleton is an enemy character that follows the player and shoots projectiles.
    Sound
    Sound loads and manages all the audio used in the game.
    Spike
    Spike is a static hazard that damages the player on contact.
    SuperZombie
    SuperZombie is a stronger enemy that patrols and shoots at the player.
    Zombie
    Zombie is a basic enemy that patrols between two points and damages the player.
